My only complaint is that I beat the entire game already. I hope they make a season 2. The graphics are beautiful.

title.label: Thanks from a Complete Thumb Dork

content.label:
The first time I downloaded Oddmar, I opened it, saw it consisted of jumping puzzles, and applauded its beauty. Then deleted it. 

Then I saw it in the App Store again some time later and tried again. The way you‚Äôve programmed this game takes a lot of pressure off this dork. It appears by the ratings that people love it, so it‚Äôs obviously the right amount of challenging for the widest swath of people. Which is amazing, combined with the fact that the controls don‚Äôt make me want to quit immediately. I‚Äôm having fun with it. It may get more challenging dexterity-wise in later levels and I‚Äôm cool with that. (I‚Äôm lying, I would be way more bitter)
I really enjoy this game.  No real criticizm

title.label: Beautiful Game... but controls have issues

content.label:
UPDATE: There‚Äôs another set of controls (on-screen) that can be toggled on in the Settings menu. MUCH better! The location of the ‚Äújump down‚Äù button is odd (as it‚Äôs above the other controls, which isn‚Äôt intuitive), and I still have trouble hitting attack vs. jump sometimes, but it‚Äôs much improved, so I‚Äôm upgrading to 4 stars.

The game is incredibly and beautifully rendered, and the story is fun. The levels are interesting and well-designed. Too bad the controllers (at least, on iPad) are the worst I‚Äôve ever used. They ruin the game. 

The ‚Äúleft thumb‚Äù (directional) control randomly reverses direction from right to left, often in mid-jump, usually resulting in instant death. Meanwhile, the ‚Äúright thumb‚Äù (action) control can‚Äôt distinguish between a single tap (attack), upward swipe (jump), and downward swipe (shield bash/jump off platform). This usually results in taking an enemy‚Äôs hit or jumping down into a pit death when you meant to attack. 

I can‚Äôt stress how frustratingly bad the controls are. I‚Äôve never been closer to chucking my iPad across the room.
You can‚Äôt play the game when you don‚Äôt have internet because it will tell you that the level hasn‚Äôt been downloaded. Fun game but it seems like a ripoff for 5 dollars.
Smart play

This is an amazing classic that should be in everyone‚Äôs game library. Do yourself a real favor, play with with a game-pad on a larger iPad screen and just enjoy the beauty. It‚Äôs like Donkey Kong Country, only more fluid and a little more forgiving.
This is a must buy. It was a little short but very well done. Ready for a sequel now.
This isnt very fun. Im confused about its popularity

This game is very attractive and I want to like it, but frankly, the controls are a disaster.  I‚Äôve tested on a fairly new iPad Pro and an iPhone 11, and have found it extremely hard to control.  I think this game was really designed to be played with an XBox controller or something similar.

This game is a AAA+ title that demonstrates how great real gaming can be on iPad OS. This game would be a stunner on the Nintendo Switch and easily at home on the Xbox & PS4. The production quality is first rate, and the game is so much fun. I cant wait for the sequel and to see what else this team comes up with.

Update again:  I am absolutely stuck trying to beat the ‚Äúbig bad guy‚Äù on a level.  Have attempted at least 50 times; it‚Äôs impossible for me, and it‚Äôs no longer fun.  I give up.  I‚Äôm not a huge gamer, so I suppose this shouldn‚Äôt be a huge shock to me, but this is only on, I guess you‚Äôd call it, world 4, and I‚Äôm completely stumped.

Update:  I now have an Xbox controller and the controls are perfect.  I love the game and still appreciate pay once and play. Upgrading from 4 to 5 stars. 

I like it. The story and graphics are great. It‚Äôs not too hard for a casual gamer. I‚Äôm having a little trouble with the right-hand controls: tap should be attack and swipe up is jump, but I‚Äôm ending up not doing what I want. Only on level 4 so maybe I‚Äôll get better at it. 

Thank you, developers, for having a pay once and play game!!  They‚Äôre so few and far between these days.

I love this game.  The graphics are wonderful. I am  a big fan. I have been playing this game for a month or two and I‚Äôve gotten to fighting Loki. It‚Äôs been tricky but I finally beat him. Oh wait...why did it start me all over again. I smashed the gem 3 times.   What just happened.  It thinks I died.  Just so the developer knows. This has happened 4 times so far. For whatever reason maybe there was a glitch in the game and I got hit on my last heart but didn‚Äôt register till seconds later or what not.

Great game but every time I approach a hornet in game the sound glitches and makes a continuous ringing sound until I turn off the game. The levels without hornets are fine but I have to turn off the sound when the ringing starts. Hopefully, this will be fixed.
Amazing game, excellent graphics and just super fun. One question why does it say in the Apple TV App Store that it is 200 MB but in the storage on my Apple TV once I installed it, it says 1GB?

title.label: One of the most fun and well designed games I have played on the iPad

content.label: I played Oddmar with a steelseries controller on a 12.9 inch iPad Pro 2018 and I must say this game is really well designed and played through flawlessly. Graphics are A+ and difficult is a little hard, but no so bad that a few runs through you can‚Äôt pass anything. The challenges and the story line also add a lot to the game. Well done! Can‚Äôt wait to play the sequel :-)

One of the my favorite mobile games of all
Time!

Especially right now, with this gosh dern Budweiser virus we all could use a way to relax, unwind, veg out.... what have you..
This game is that. I can‚Äôt speak to not having a wireless controller, but I use my Xbox one controller and it handles AMAZINGLY. The game is done very well and for 4.99 it is worth double that. 
I‚Äôm a character designer and I have to say The art is spectacular and creatures and movement are pixelated perfection . If you know the REAL story of Vikings, then the mushroom parts make PERFECT sense. I‚Äôm awestruck at how great it is, really.
Think capcoms strider to a point. I wish I had the mental capacity to explain further, I‚Äôll just say this... I DONT spend money on games. If the screen shots and other reviews don‚Äôt convince you, I don‚Äôt know what to say. It‚Äôs fun, cute, gnarly, dope, fresh, hella hella, fire y‚Äôall.
Awesome game
Can‚Äôt stop playing this!
I love the graphics and storyline of this game but please fix the app sound! Ive tried deleting the app and re-downloading it multiple times and it still has no sound.

Best side scroller I‚Äôve ever played on a touch screen. Whimsical and humorous, beautifully rendered with intuitive controls- a seamless game worth every penny. The art, music, cut scenes and occasional in-game surprises are completely fantastic and make the the gaming experience one of the best in this genre and format. Hardcore retro gamers might remember Little Samson from the final days of the NES- this is reminiscent of that cult classic with all the modern improvements you could ask for. An absolutely brilliant game.
I love it it,,,,,
Best game on the App Store. Feels like games I played on Nintendo and Sega Genesis as a kid!
Great game but the controls are just broken. More often than not you get the wrong reaction for your input. This means each level becomes and more frustrating.
Hello app developers, can you PLEASE create an Oddmar 2!!!! I can‚Äôt find another game that is so engaging and entertaining. Please!!!
If you‚Äôre looking for a fun Mario-style platformer this is worth the $5

Don‚Äôt get me wrong. This app deserves a 5* rating; it‚Äôs an awesome game. However, I cannot rate the game above a 1* as I cannot play anything past the first level because the app will not download the next level. My connection is not the problem. When I try to download the second the level I get the download progress bar but it will not download the second level at all for some reason. I‚Äôll gladly change my review to a 5* once the issue is resolved. If anyone knows why please enlighten me.

To the developers:
Before you suggest that I uninstall and reinstall the app please read my review in its entirety as I‚Äôve reinstalled the game multiple times. I see I am not the only person with this issue. I have the latest iOS version available for my iPhone 6. Please, I‚Äôm begging you to help me resolve this issue as I‚Äôve paid the $4.99 to purchase the game. Unfortunately I cannot play past the first level.

The graphics are unique (also Oddmar) and I have just started it and I think it is one of my favorites if you like action packed suspenseful and beautiful games then this is the right one it‚Äôs like altos adventure but better in a way
